question:
Which among the following is/ are true about the treaty of Poona of 1817?
1. Peshwa Bajirao II relinquished the post of the leader of the Maratha empire
2. Bajirao II gave up some parts of his territory to the British
3. Bajirao II was forced not to make an alliance with any external power without British consent
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: As per the treaty of Poona (1817), Peshwa Bajirao II relinquished the post of the leader of the Maratha empire. He gave up some parts of his territory to the British. Not only that. He was forced not to make an alliance with any external power without the consent from the British.
